name: Faisal Al Mahmoud
bio: With over 15 years of experience in Dubai real estate, Faisal has advised HNW clients from Europe, Asia, and the Middle East on strategic property investments. His approach combines deep market knowledge with a commitment to client success.

name: Sarah Chen
bio: Sarah brings a decade of experience from Singapore's family office sector, specializing in cross-border real estate transactions. She leads our relationships with Asian investors seeking Dubai diversification.

name: James Morrison
bio: James oversees client experience and ensures seamless transaction management. His background in luxury hospitality brings a service-first approach to every client interaction.
